channel.title: life on The Blag
channel.description: Recent content in life on The Blag

item.title: The Secret of Life
item.description: There is no secret of life. First forgive yourself, of the mistakes that haunt you. Then become what you always wanted to be, Or try to be as close to it as possible. Be humble and friendly. Receive what you get with open hands, And know the value of what you have, And try to share it too. Of all the versions of you, Who might have been, Be the best you could be.

item.title: Happy New Year
item.description: Happy New Year Thats pretty much it. If you want the full res image you can get it from imgur Share the image if you like it, Also add the link to this post. i.e. https://git.io/vbbwB
